Description: A huge 35 foot long living room with tons of windows highlights this nice Bungalow style single family home. There are three bedrooms, a large open dining area with lots of natural wood work details and an ornamental fireplace. Fully applianced kitchen and gleaming hardwood floors. Lots of character here. Great for entertaining! Lower level for exercising or office. Gas heat & hot water. Garage parking and a huge back yard. Pets considered if well behaved. Property ID # 25635
